name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
schedule:
WEEK	SESSION THEME
1	Introduction
2     	Cross-Cultural Translation Problems
3     	Translation of practical texts: advertisement
4     	Translation of practical texts: brochures
5    	Translation of practical texts: recipes
6    	Translation and international relations I
7    	Translation and international relations II
8    	Group presentation
9    	Mid-term
10   	Translation and business I
11   	Translation and business II
12   	Translation and technology I
13   	Translation and technology II
14   	Translation and media: subtitling I
15   	Translation and media: subtitling II
16   	Translation and media: subtitling III
17   	Group presentation
18    	Final
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
-	25% on mid-term examination
-	25% on final examination
-	50% on continual assessments: attendance to lectures; presentations; in-class performance; homework
